plot: A young coal miner returns home from the second World War to the unchanged, harsh reality of life in a company town. Unionization has the town divided and thoroughly at war with itself. ...
title: Let It Be War
plot_es: A young coal miner returns home from the second World War to the unchanged, harsh reality of life in a company town. Unionization has the town divided and thoroughly at war with itself. ...
